mapper.select: SELECT sum(WorkOrder_RQty) Total_RQty, date(WorkOrder_CompleteTime) WorkOrder_CompleteTime FROM WorkOrder_tbl wt WHERE WorkOrder_WorkStatus='245' AND date_format(WorkOrder_CompleteTime, '%Y-%m') = #{startDate} GROUP BY date(wt.WorkOrder_CompleteTime)

SELECT omlt.OutMat_Code, pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME OutMat_Name, SUM(omlt.OutMat_Qty) OutMat_Qty, omlt.OutMat_Consignee, dt2.CHILD_TBL_TYPE OutMat_Consignee_Name, date(OutMat_Date) AS OutMat_Date, LAST_DAY(OutMat_Date - interval 2 month) + interval 1 DAY AS Last_Month FROM OutMatLX_tbl omlt INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON omlt.OutMat_Consignee = dt2.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_INFO_TBL pit ON omlt.OutMat_Code = pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE where DATE(OutMat_Date) BETWEEN LAST_DAY(OutMat_Date - interval 2 month) + interval 1 DAY AND #{datestr1} AND OutMat_Qty != 0 GROUP BY OutMat_Name, OutMat_Consignee, DATE(OutMat_Date) order by DATE(OutMat_Date) desc

SELECT rocal.OutMat_Date, COUNT(date(rocal.OutMat_Date)) OutMat_Count FROM(SELECT OutMat_Consignee, pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME OutMat_Name, DATE(OutMat_Date) AS OutMat_Date FROM OutMatLX_tbl omlt INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON omlt.OutMat_Consignee = dt2.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_INFO_TBL pit ON omlt.OutMat_Code = pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE WHERE DATE(OutMat_Date) BETWEEN LAST_DAY(OutMat_Date - INTERVAL 2 MONTH) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AND #{datestr1} AND OutMat_Qty != 0\ GROUP BY OutMat_Consignee, OutMat_Name, DATE(OutMat_Date)) AS rocal GROUP BY DATE(OutMat_Date) ORDER BY DATE(OutMat_Date) desc
